description:
I was trying to deploy rhosp11 using following commands-
sudo yum localinstall -y http://rhos-release.virt.bos.redhat.com/repos/rhos-release/rhos-release-latest.noarch.rpm
rhos-release 11   -p $1
yum -y update
yum -y install openstack-packstack 
sudo packstack --allinone or sudo packstack --default-password=password --allinone --os-neutron-lbaas-install=y --os-neutron-vpnaas-install=y --neutron-fwaas=y --os-sahara-install=y --os-manila=y


I am getting an following error

ERROR : Error appeared during Puppet run: 10.65.207.56_controller.pp
Error: Systemd start for httpd failed!
title: RHOSP11 is not able to restart httpd

comments.content:
I was trying to deploy rhosp11 using following commands-
sudo yum localinstall -y http://rhos-release.virt.bos.redhat.com/repos/rhos-release/rhos-release-latest.noarch.rpm
rhos-release 11   -p $1
yum -y update
yum -y install openstack-packstack 
sudo packstack --allinone or sudo packstack --default-password=password --allinone --os-neutron-lbaas-install=y --os-neutron-vpnaas-install=y --neutron-fwaas=y --os-sahara-install=y --os-manila=y


I am getting an following error

ERROR : Error appeared during Puppet run: 10.65.207.56_controller.pp
Error: Systemd start for httpd failed!

comments.content:
@Anand: 
What is RHOSP 11 ?

This is not the right place to add redhat openstack bugs.
Please file it on redhat bugzilla.


Discarding the bug
